name: Finton's Christmas Adventure
description:
Help Eudora get her gift back from the evil present stealer in this fun, little 2d platformer game. Play as Finton and chase the present stealer through a series of obstacles and help return the present to Eudora.

This is a game I made in 72 hours for the #yogscastgamejam2020 and so there's probably going to be some bugs and a lot of rough edges., although I hope you enjoy it!

All the art, code and game design was done by me in the 72 hour window but the credits for the audio goes to:

Finton's jump sfx - felixyadomi

https://freesound.org/people/felixyadomi/sounds/456367/

Present stealer's jump sfx - ShaneF91

https://freesound.org/people/ShaneF91/sounds/386572/

Background music - Erokia

https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325611/

Die sfx - blosche

https://freesound.org/people/blosche/sounds/387433/

And the font was created by Supersemar Letter

https://www.dafont.com/winter-break.font

Made with the Godot Engine.

Thanks for playing.
